MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ StrokeDashArray { System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值的集合，這些值表示用來畫出圖案外框之虛線和間隙的模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of values that indicate the pattern of dashes and gaps that is used to outline shapes.

value.span: 值的集合，指定虛線和間隙的模式。

span.span: A collection of values that specify the pattern of dashes and gaps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個集合中指定的 dash 或相對於間隔長度的畫筆。Each in the collection specifies the length of a dash or gap relative to the of the pen. 例如，值為`1`建立虛線或畫筆 （方格） 粗細的相同長度的間隙。For example, a value of `1` creates a dash or gap that has the same length as the thickness of the pen (a square). 在集合中，位於索引 0，第一個項目指定虛線; 的長度第二個項目，位於索引 1，指定間隔的長度。The first item in the collection, which is located at index 0, specifies the length of a dash; the second item, which is located at index 1, specifies the length of a gap. 即使當索引值的物件指定虛線;含有奇數索引值的物件指定的間距。Objects with an even index value specify dashes; objects with an odd index value specify gaps.

span.span: Gets or sets a enumeration value that specifies the type of join that is used at the vertices of a .
One of the enumeration values for

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定對無頂點，例如項目上，這個屬性就不會影響項目。This property has no effect if you set it on an element that has no vertices, such as on a element. ## Examples 下列範例會示範數個不同的聯結用於圖形的頂點。The following example shows several different joints used at the vertices of a shape. [!code-xaml[drawingwithshapeelements#PolylineExample1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingWithShapeElements/CS/polylineexample.xaml#polylineexample1)] 下圖顯示不同的線條聯結。The following illustration shows the different line joins. ![線條聯結的範例。](~/add/media/graphicslinejoins.png "線條聯結的範例。")![Example of line joins.](~/add/media/graphicslinejoins.png "Example of line joins.")

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double StrokeMiterLimit { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定限制，將斜接面長度比例限制為 項目的 一半。

span.span: Gets or sets a limit on the ratio of the miter length to half the of a element.

value.span: 限制，將接面長度比例限制為 項目的 。

span.span: The limit on the ratio of the miter length to the of a element.

value.span: 此值一律是大於或等於 1 的正數。

span.span: This value is always a positive number that is greater than or equal to 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 斜接角形成斜切兩個聯結線條。當兩個線段符合銳角時，斜接角可能會超出線條的粗細畫路徑。A miter forms a corner by beveling the ends of two joined lines.When two line segments meet at a sharp angle, the miter may extend beyond the thickness of the line that strokes the path.
